greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f. exp(x)/(cos(x)+sin(x)).
comment: Row sums of number triangle A117442. Binomial transform of alternating sign Springer numbers (-1)^n*A001586(n).
formula: G.f.: 1/Q(0) where Q(k) = 1 + 4*k*x - 2*x^2*(2*k + 1)^2/( 1 + (4*k+2)*x - 2*x^2*(2*k + 2)^2/Q(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Mar 10 2013
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 16 2006
